message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $6000, you get $4000.  It's in your best interest to settle early.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  This way, we both get a good deal and we can move on to other things.
Bob, that's not how this works. I'm offering you $4500, which is more valuable than it will be in later rounds. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
